label: Sequence New Version
blurb: Duplicate the sequence and increment the name. If the sequence doesn't end with a number, _v2 will be appended. The original sequence will be closed and moved to a subfolder '_OLD'

label: Sequence Snapshot
blurb: Save a timestamped copy of the sequence with notes added to a metadata column

label: Navigate Snapshots
blurb: Browse snapshots attached to the active sequence

label: Fill Frame
blurb: Set size of selected clips to fill the frame with minimum crop

label: Proxies Only
blurb: Make hi-res media offline for clips that have proxies attached. Once on, click again to re-online

label: Import Monitoring
blurb: Check that every file imported is within a defined location
